Name: Retrievable
About the game: Heaving trouble with the game ? Mini-tutorial; Spoilers for the first level of the game, in Community hub Retrievable is an exploration game with the focus on relaxation. You can explore different levels within which nothing can kill you. Explore different levels, about 5 hours of gameplay. Mini-story: An important emerald was stolen and has to be retrieved. Re-play value: Some game elements, like items, are randomly placed in the level. So each new game is different.
